characters

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • characters.Sprite
            • characters.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Weapon
extends Sprite
    The Weapon class represents a laser gun that is a Sprite and Mario and Bobs can fire the Sprite once they pick it up as a special ability for a one time use that deals 200 damage at once on the other Sprite. It spawns in when a Mario or Bob has less than 500 health and can shoot.
    Version:
    05/21/22
    Author:
    Frank An
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(processing.core.PImage img,
              int x,
              int y,
              int health)
        Initializes a Weapon with a given PImage (img), given center (x,y) and health.
        Parameters:
        img - PImage that is drawn onto the DrawingSurface of the game that represents the Weapon.
        x - X-coordinate of top left center.
        y - Y-coordinate of top left center.
        health - health of the Weapon.

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public void shoot(processing.core.PApplet surface,
                  double mx,
                  double my,
                  Sprite l,
                  Sprite t)
        Displays a laser that comes out of the weapon.laser does 200 damage to the character it's being shot at.
        Parameters:
        surface -
        mx - - x coordinate of the mouse click on the screen
        my - - y coordinate of the mouse click on the screen
        l - - character that is shooting
        t - - character that is being shot at
